name: Ant Corp
description:
Game project for the Taller Inicial de Videojuegos course of Ingeniería en Desarrollo de Videojuegos y Realidad Virtual at Universidad de Talca. Talca, Chile. Period: 2020-2.

INFO

------------------------------------

-- Title: Ant Corp -- Genre: Puzzle-Platformer. -- Initial publication: 2020-11-26. -- Developers: - Gabriel Balassa - Lisbeth González - Sebastián Martin

------------------------------------

DESCRIPTION

Human society now lives underground, and it's your job to deliver their packages!

A drilling movement-system enables the player to solve puzzles as he breaks through ground to fulfill his missions. However, this isn't without obstacles! Lava pockets and gravity itself play against you as you excavate.

Luckily, your mineral-powered drill allows you to move upwards and over chasms as long as you have ground to dig. Yet, you have to keep moving and be very precise!

NOTE: As of now, this is a limited proof-of-concept, showing off several mechanics including drilling, magma and the mission system. There're currently two short-but-fun missions to complete, using the in-game bulletin board.

Feel free to leave helpful comments below!
